lom:description.lom:string:
This tutorial is a brief introduction to VBScript. The site goes through the fundamentals and discusses how to add VBScript to existing web pages, the structure of the VBScript language, and how to use event-driven programming within HTML documents." There are 5 lessons: Lesson 1: Adding VBScript to Web Pages
Lesson 2: Working with Variables
Lesson 3: Objects and VBScript
Lesson 4: Controlling VBScript Routines
Lesson 5: Using VBScript with Forms.
